childs.name: Underworld Contacts
perks: +30% Solari from pillaging a Village Underworld Headquarters produce 30% of the Village's Plascrete production
-30% gear customisation costs in the Barracks

childs.name: Modular Parts
perks: Unlocks Harvester Works Building in Sietch Tuek

childs.name: Tinkerer Teams
perks: Underworld Headquarters produce 20% of their Village's Spice production
Unlocks the Spice Silots Village Building

childs.name: Crew Training Program
perks: Harvesters Set to auto-recall will also deploy automatically when danger

childs.name: Economic Lobbying
perks: Unlocks 1 Agent Slot in Choam Infiltration
Unlocks the Choam Branch Building in Sietch Tuek

childs.name: Riches of Arrakis
perks: +20 Solari production per controlled Special Region
+2% total Solari production per controlled Special Region
+20% Village resource production in Special Regions
